lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A. fined Shock Coach Bill Laimbeer yesterday for criticizing the officiating after Detroit lost to the Sacramento Monarchs, 89-69, in Game 3 of the league finals. The league did not announce the amount of the fine. Sacramento leads the best-of-five series, 2-1, and can clinch its second consecutive championship with a victory in Game 4 tonight.
